text: Located in an office building, the Singing Bowl Gallery offers sound bath sessions, workshops and sale of singing bowls etc. A clean, safe & serene environment especially on weekends when building is empty. Professional teachers and staff: done Haruka and Maeâ€™s sound bath/meditation sessions and absolutely love the therapeutic effects. Highly recommend this place.

Me & friend attended our first breath work & sound session with Haruka last night. She plays the flute beautifully. It was a calming & peaceful session and the space was relaxing & cozy. Haruka's very friendly & approachable , she makes you feel so welcomed. Don't be surprised to find yourself falling asleep for awhile during her session ,that's normal and i meant in a good way :)  I'd recommend this place to anyone looking to learn some breathing techniques and apply in your daily life.

My first singing bowl experience is with Singing Bowl gallery and I absolutely love it. Haruka's reiki + singing bowl session is absolutely magical and rejuvenating. She leads the session with her peaceful and beautiful voice, I could almost imagine myself in vast pasture during the session. I've returned for more sessions and will definitely be doing more here.
If you are in need a way to dissipate your stress and unblock your chakra. This is the place to be. Tingle away those tension and stress. Feel the burden washes away when u bath in sound

Attended the aromatherapy and sound bath session conducted by Jeannie. It was an eye-opening and extremely restorative first experience for me! I felt the difference in my stress levels immediately after the session.
